attributes.action: to relax the immigration rules that restrict unskilled workers from entering the country so that Bangladeshi chefs can enter the country and keep our curry houses running.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What sort of country is it that we live in that we consider a chef as unskilled labour? The curry is now the most popular dish in this country and, as the late Robin Cook pointed out, chicken tikka masala is a genuine example of a multi-cultural dish.
